name: Hourai
description:
Hourai is a doll that has been locked in its owner's room, the plushies are jealous because she is the child's favorite toy and they are willing to do anything to change that.

Assets used in this project are not mine, teachers gave me them to make a project with ONLY these assets.

Assets are from Unity Survival Shooter tutorial

I also used Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare OST

Controls
  • ASDW to move
  • Left click  to throw tops
  • Right click to hit with the bat
  • Space to jump
  • Esc / P to pause
